title: What is a step by step equation for this problem “7 less than the quotient of 2x and 5”? - Quora

response.answer_text: The “less than” means < The “quotient” means “divide the first by the second” so that the quotient of 24 and 4 is 24/4 = 6. So the equation is 7 is less than 2x divided by 5, 7< 2x/5
